link_desc:
The home of this template has changed to https://github.com/Cosium/zabbix_zfs-on-linux . The template is now a little more focused on ZFS on Linux, but thanks to stumbaumr on Github, the core of the features works on FreeBSD, now without gsed.

Original description:

Modified from https://www.zabbix.com/forum/showthread.php?t=43347 , this template is used to monitor ZFS on FreeBSD.

You need sudo, gsed (GNU sed) and zfs-stats to make it work. Also you need several sudo rules to allow zabbix to run the appropriate commands.

Included in the zip are: the template file, the user parameters file and the sudo rule file.

The version of the template for Linux (with ZFS on Linux) is available at https://share.zabbix.com/operating-systems/linux/zfs-on-linux .

There is a missing regular expression named "ZFS Fileset" that you must create, the name is "ZFS Fileset" and the rule is:

Expression : /

Expression type : character string included
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active
author: AceSlash
